channel.title: Big Data in Biomedicine
channel.description: Recent content on Big Data in Biomedicine

item.description: I am a Ph.D. student at Chair of Experimental Bioinformatics at TU Munich. I will be working on the Microbiome Project. I received my Bachelor’s degree in Bioinformatics from Tamil Nadu Agricultural University and my Masters from Karunya Institute of Technology and Sciences, India. My master thesis was about building a draft genome annotation of Carica cauliflora using NGS pipeline. For my part-semester project, I worked on the characterization of Alternative Splicing events in Arabidopsis thaliana using the RNA-Seq approach at MPI-MP, Germany.

item.title: Network analysis methods for studying microbial communities: A mini review
Primer, Pipelines, Parameters: Issues in 16S rRNA Gene Sequencing
